_header: With this ring I wed thee / and with my body I worship thee

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Wit þis ring I wende þe& wit mi bodi i
                    worschep þeOf on onlawe non is mad felawe
BLHar7322.Editions:
Oliver,  Raymond. 
             Poems Without Names: The English Lyric 1200-1500.
         Berkeley, CA: University of California, 1970: 101.
